name: Panthematic
description:
Panthemic is a game based on the story of a place in space were u are stuck inside your car and the atmosphere has become very poisonous because of a pandemic  and you need to survive from big mutated viruses in the environment which continuously takes your life and u need to eat golden carrots in order to survive

best of luck to survive and to chechk the source code go to my github you can contact me on twitter and github , both of the profiles are given in the game credits menu

please try and download the game beacuase the webgl has low performance and it also has some features missing like the contacts open in brouser feature so please download the game to have full experiance
